name: Slime Climb (wbschultz)
description:
Submission for Sac Dev Collective's Voyager Jam 2020!

Theme: Lifeform

Description: Endlessly climbing while avoiding electric obstacles would be pretty tedious--if you weren't a gelatinous lifeform! Bounce your way up as high as you can in this jelly-filled infinite climber. Watch out for electricity or you'll have to start back from the bottom!

Controls: Just click and drag like a slingshot to launch the slime in the opposite direction. You can only jump launch before contacting another wall.

Big thanks to Baharto for the game music, and my girlfriend for the title art!
